question: 1. Which of these best describes an array?

answers.a: A data structure that shows a hierarchical behavior
answers.b: Container of objects of similar types
answers.c: Container of objects of mixed types.

question: 2. What is the time complexity of insertion at any point on an array?
3. Pick incorrect options from the following

answers.a: If structure contains 3 types of data then three pointers are required for that structure
answers.b: One variable can be bound to many structures
answers.c: Contents of a structure are stored in contiguous memory

question: 4. What are the reason/ reasons for using pointers in a C program?

answers.a: Pointers allow different functions to share and modify their local variables
answers.b: To pass large structures so that complete copy of the structure can be avoided
answers.c: Pointers enable complex “linked” data structures like linked lists and binary trees

question: 5. Pick out incorrect statement from the following

answers.a: Linked list is a data structure
answers.b: Linked list is made up of structures
answers.c: The nodes of linked list will always be stored contiguously
answers.d: Linked lists do not allow random access
